title: Bug 18915[Preferences] Switching Between Erroneous Preferences Pages Should Generate Error, Not Warning.
OB: When entering invalid data on any preference page and attempting to switch to another page without fixing the problem, a warning dialog appears with the message: 'Warning: The currently displayed page contains invalid values.'
EB: The warning dialog should be an 'error' dialog instead, as users should not be allowed to leave the page without addressing the mistake.
SR:
1. Enter invalid data on any preference page, triggering a red flag on the UI.
2. Attempt to switch to another page without fixing the problem.
3. Observe the warning dialog: 'Warning: The currently displayed page contains invalid values.'
